author: obi0837
content: Hi everyone , I just want to get an opinion f you guys on my problem . So we have a running ERC-20 token on mainnet with about 200 transactions . Now we would like to implement some layer 2 solution to reduce fees as in our case micro transactions are a big factor . Now how should I go for this ? we can develop offchain solution but how would we make changes in existing ERC-20
